Drag and drop the events above to create: Drag and drop the events above to create a new one.
Use ALT by dragging it to copy the event: Use ALT by dragging it to copy the events.
single_description: Will be triggered once for one time event. Please provide the Object ID and desired value.
double_description: Will be triggered twice for one time event. One time by start and one time after defined duration. Please provide the Object ID, start and end values.
toggle_description: Will be triggered twice for one time event. One time by start and one time after defined duration. Please provide the Object ID and start value. End value will be calculated automatically.
